text: General elections were held in Ecuador on 17 February 2013 to elect the President, the National Assembly, Provincial Assemblies and members of the Andean Parliament. President Rafael Correa was re-elected by a landslide. The vote had been set for January 2013, but was put back a month to allow a full year to pass after the reform of election rules. ==References== Category:2013 in South America Category:2010s in Ecuador Category:Elections in Ecuador Category:February 2013 events
title: 2013 Ecuadorian general election
